definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: A material handler in the downstream location is signaled to withdraw parts.
sentences.chinese: 位於下游的物料管理員收到領取零部件的信號。

sentences.english: The scheme has a present value of nearly $270, 000 to a new recipient.
sentences.chinese: 一位新的補助成員現在可以領取近27萬美元。

sentences.english: Please select the BEA Branch from which you would like to collect all your Personalised Octopus cards.
sentences.chinese: 請選擇領取所有個人八達通卡之東亞銀行分行。

sentences.english: Thousands of militants traded in guns for stipends and training.
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬的武裝分子開始接受培訓並領取安家費。

sentences.english: Original receipts must be presented before redemption at Neways Singapore Product Showcase.
sentences.chinese: 在領取贈品時必需附上收據。

sentences.english: Pre-registration visitors could receive license cover and sling there.
sentences.chinese: 預登記持卡觀衆可在此領取證件套及吊繩。

sentences.english: My mother and I get the basket into the orchard and the scissors.
sentences.chinese: 我和媽媽領取提籃和剪子進入果園。

sentences.english: Self-guided tour maps and information on the academy are available at the information desk.
sentences.chinese: 可在服務檯領取在該大學自由行的地圖和資料。

sentences.english: During the interval, please request the other half of your tickets from the attendant at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 中場休息時請向門口服務員領取副券。

sentences.english: The original card shall be surrendered when obtaining a new one.
sentences.chinese: 領取新證時，必須交回原證。

sentences.english: Besides his regular wages,the chauffeur picks up money in tips.
sentences.chinese: 那位司機除領取正常工資之外，還可以收點小費。

sentences.english: These people include single parents relying on social security, and those who are underemployed .
sentences.chinese: 這些人包括領取綜援的單親及失業人士。

sentences.english: Any person under the age of 18 is ineligible for benefit.
sentences.chinese: 未滿18歲者無資格領取補助金。

sentences.english: Unionized workers at the plants will continue to receive at least 85 percent of their pay, as stipulated in their contracts.
sentences.chinese: 根據合同規定，工會工人將繼續領取原工資的85%。

sentences.english: The "newlyweds" also received marriage certificates.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 狗狗們還領取到了寵物結婚證書。

sentences.english: Redemption of premiums are valid in Neways Singapore Product Showcase only.
sentences.chinese: 領取贈品只限於新衛斯新加坡產品成列室。

definition: to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
